action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a collection of colorful shapes arranged in a seemingly random pattern. The shapes include a red square, a purple square, a red inverted L-shape, a yellow inverted T-shape, a yellow cross, and a purple inverted L-shape. The background is white.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a collection of abstract shapes in various colors, including blue, green, gray, and cyan. The shapes are arranged in a seemingly random pattern, with no discernible order or repetition. The shapes include crosses, plus signs, and other geometric forms. The background is white, and the shapes are placed in a scattered manner across the image.
